", "answer": "The Hon\u2019ble Administrator is responsible for awarding the IPS-2022 awards based on the recommendations finalized by the Secretary (Industries). \n"}, {"question": "What happens to the benefit of the incentive if a newly setup enterprise is sold or transferred to a new owner within the first five years of its establishment? ", "answer": "If a newly setup enterprise is sold or otherwise transferred to a new owner during the period of five years, the benefit of the incentive shall be available to such transferee or the new owner, only for the unexpired portion.
